name: Specter Inspector (kora)
description:
You are an inspector tasked with investigating a mysterious house that has recently reported as haunted. Begrudgingly traverse this multistage house, searching for clues and hidden secrets. But be careful to not expose yourself to ghosts for too long, as they might not be so friendly.

Updated itch:  https://remivaughan.itch.io/cs3113-exercise5

Credits:
